mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, FOLLOWER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM FOLLOW JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE FOLLOWER_NO = #{followerNo} ORDER BY FOLLOW_NO

SELECT F.MEMBER_NO, F.FOLLOWER_NO, M2.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS FOLLOWER_NICKNAME FROM FOLLOW F JOIN "MEMBER" M1 ON F.MEMBER_NO = M1.MEMBER_NO JOIN "MEMBER" M2 ON F.FOLLOWER_NO = M2.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.MEMBER_NO = #{followerNo} ORDER BY F.FOLLOW_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_COMENT, ELAPSED_TIME, MEMBER_NO, SEND_NO, SEND_PROFILE) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{memberNo},#{sendNo},#{sendProfile})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_COMENT, ELAPSED_TIME, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME , SEND_NO, SEND_PROFILE FROM NOTICE JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC FETCH FIRST 20 ROWS ONLY
